events.name: Lithium Supply Chain Development for EV Batteries
events.wd_label: Lithium Supply Chain Development for EV Batteries
events.wd_description: The Biden administration announced plans to use the Defense Production Act to ramp up the mining and processing of key minerals used in batteries for renewable energy and electric vehicles.

events.name: Lithium-ion battery chemistries
events.wd_description: There are five general types of lithium-ion battery chemistries: lithium cobalt oxide (LCO), lithium manganese oxide (LMO), lithium iron phosphate (LFP), lithium nickel manganese cobalt (NMC), and lithium nickel cobalt aluminum (NCA).
events.description: There are five general types of lithium-ion battery chemistries: lithium cobalt oxide (LCO), lithium manganese oxide (LMO), lithium iron phosphate (LFP), lithium nickel manganese cobalt (NMC), and lithium nickel cobalt aluminum (NCA).

events.name: Lithium cobalt oxide (LCO)
events.wd_description: LCO is one of the common types of lithium-ion battery chemistries.
events.description: LCO is one of the common types of lithium-ion battery chemistries.

events.name: Lithium manganese oxide (LMO)
events.wd_description: LMO is another common type of lithium-ion battery chemistry.
events.description: LMO is another common type of lithium-ion battery chemistry.

events.name: Lithium iron phosphate (LFP)
events.wd_description: LFP is a type of lithium-ion battery chemistry known for safety and efficiency.
events.description: LFP is a type of lithium-ion battery chemistry known for safety and efficiency.

events.name: Lithium nickel manganese cobalt (NMC)
events.wd_description: NMC is a popular lithium-ion battery chemistry due to its high energy density.
events.description: NMC is a popular lithium-ion battery chemistry due to its high energy density.

events.name: Lithium nickel cobalt aluminum (NCA)
events.wd_description: NCA is a high-energy-density lithium-ion battery chemistry used in various applications.
events.description: NCA is a high-energy-density lithium-ion battery chemistry used in various applications.
